summary: Sun-young, a popular radio host, decides to quit her job to take care of her ill-daughter. But, the last day of her job turns nightmarish when a murderer takes her family hostage.
cast: Soo Ae|Yoo Ji-Tae|Joon-Ha Lee|Dong-seok Ma|Song-hyeon Choi|Da-eun Sin|Man-sik Jeong|Min Kyu Kim|Seok-hyeon Jo|Ji-Hyun Nam|Hee-Won Choi|Tae-goo Eom|Hyuna|Shin-Young Kim|Yun-tae Kim|Do-won Kwak|Hyeon-geol Lee|Sun-Joo Lee|Tae-kyeong Park|Hui-Won Yun
title: Simya-ui FM
